name: Lacedon
description: The Lacedon is a Medium undead creature that embodies a malevolent presence, often found lurking in dark waters or decaying environments, resembling a ghoul.
memorable: Its ability to paralyze foes quickly makes it a formidable opponent in combat.
goals: Typically seeks to ambush and subdue living creatures.
relations: Often found alongside other undead creatures, as it shares traits with ghouls.
environment: Dark waters or areas with decay.
strengths: Good agility and the ability to paralyze living creatures.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage, which can impair its combat effectiveness.
attacks: Paralyzing Claw can incapacitate foes; Bite can inflict additional damage on weakened targets.
most_powerful_ability: Paralyzing Claw allows it to immobilize targets for up to a minute, significantly altering the battlefield dynamics.
additional_information: Radiant Sensitivity makes it particularly weak against radiant damage.
Does not require air, food, or sleep, enhancing its survivability.
Can swim with ease, adding to its defensive tactics in aquatic environments.
Low intelligence limits its combat strategy despite its physical capabilities.
Resistant to necrotic damage, allowing it to endure in certain encounters.
test_queries: swimming undead lurking in dark waters
ghoul-like creature with a deadly claw attack
monster capable of paralysis in combat
